task.summary: Default task
Completed setting up configuration variables and dependencies.
Master Page Complete
Testing Commit
Testing Commit
Larabook changed to using SASS instead of LESS
Registration Validation - Used Laravel 5.0's Authentication out of the box, extracted errors to partials.
Thinking In Terms of Commands - Created a command to register a user, the Laravel 5.0 way.
Thinking In Terms of Commands - Created a command to register a user, the Laravel 5.0 way.
Thinking In Terms of Commands - Created a command to register a user, the Laravel 5.0 way.
Domain Events - Set up the postRegister() method to fire an event. We have also set up our EventServiceProvider to listen to the event UserRegistered and call the handler SendNotificationEmail.
Super Easy Flash Messaging - Added a flash message when user registeres using the latest flash package from laracasts. Also commented out firing the event UserRegistered.
Feedback and Filters - Nothing much to do here, Laravel 5.0 even does the navbar out the box. Just changed middleware RedirectIfAuthenticated to point to homepage.
Publishing Statuses - Got tests to work with new version of TestDummy. Also used Laravel 5.0 commands and handlers to fire a StatusPublishCommand. Using a PublishStatusRequest to validate the body.
Integration Testing Repositories - Using codeception to test out the StatusRepository that lets you call the getAllForUser() and save() methods in the controller.
Integration Testing Repositories - Using codeception to test out the StatusRepository that lets you call the getAllForUser() and save() methods in the controller.
Back from teh dead
Gravatars and View Presenters - Got it working for both using the Laracasts/Presenter Package as well as a method within Guard Auth
Designing Statuses - Styled statuses as well as created a StatusPresenter class.
Dummy Users and Statuses - Generated 50 fake users & statuses, using the https://github.com/fzaninotto/Faker package and also artisan's db:seed command.

Browsing Uesrs With Pagination - Using Laravel 5.0's pagination. Also extracted avatar partial and passing in variables to an include using an array. Didn't bother making a UserRepositoryTest because most of the pagination was out the box!
Profiles - Created a new method on the User model to check if the user is the logged in user. Uses the user id as wildcard when viewing profile instead of username.

MESSAGE.value: Completed setting up configuration variables and dependencies.
Larabook changed to using SASS instead of LESS
Users - Updated the function test to include test, seeing if user is logged in
Registration Validation - Used Laravel 5.0's Authentication out of the box, extracted errors to partials.
Thinking In Terms of Commands - Created a command to register a user, the Laravel 5.0 way.
Domain Events - Set up the postRegister() method to fire an event. We have also set up our EventServiceProvider to listen to the event UserRegistered and call the handler SendNotificationEmail.
Super Easy Flash Messaging - Added a flash message when user registeres using the latest flash package from laracasts. Also commented out firing the event UserRegistered.
Feedback and Filters - Nothing much to do here, Laravel 5.0 even does the navbar out the box. Just changed middleware RedirectIfAuthenticated to point to homepage.
Publishing Statuses - Got tests to work with new version of TestDummy. Also used Laravel 5.0 commands and handlers to fire a StatusPublishCommand. Using a PublishStatusRequest to validate the body.
Integration Testing Repositories - Using codeception to test out the StatusRepository that lets you call the getAllForUser() and save() methods in the controller.
Gravatars and View Presenters - Got it working for both using the Laracasts/Presenter Package as well as a method within Guard Auth
Designing Statuses - Styled statuses as well as created a StatusPresenter class.
Dummy Users and Statuses - Generated 50 fake users & statuses, using the https://github.com/fzaninotto/Faker package and also artisan's db:seed command.

Browsing Uesrs With Pagination - Using Laravel 5.0's pagination. Also extracted avatar partial and passing in variables to an include using an array. Didn't bother making a UserRepositoryTest because most of the pagination was out the box!
Profiles - Created a new method on the User model to check if the user is the logged in user. Uses the user id as wildcard when viewing profile instead of username.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Profiles - Created a new method on the User model to check if the user is the logged in user. Uses the user id as wildcard when viewing profile instead of username.
